prompts: Create a small fire-type Pokemon with a fluffy white body and vibrant orange flames.
Imagine a bug-like creature with bright blue eyes and a unique shell design.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in mountainous regions and has a fiery personality.
Design a Pokemon that combines elements of fire and bug types with distinctive color patterns.
Give me a creature that features orange accents and a round, compact body shape.
Generate a small, cute Pokemon with a white and orange color scheme resembling a larva.
Make a Pokemon that has a calm demeanor but can unleash fierce flames when threatened.
